name: VirtualEmployee.com
description: Outsource Any Office Work  for $895 USD
overview:
VirtualEmployee, LLC is a leading USA based Outsourcing company with near-shore facility in Wilmington and off-shore facilities in the United Kingdom and India. Providing a kaleidoscopic choice of outsourcing services at competitive prices is our main forte. Our unique business model ensures optimal supplemental staffing for our global customers.

VirtualEmployee.com boasts of a commendably large bank of knowledgeable professionals. Unlike the US based service providers, we charge you just $895 a month (no hidden cost) for each such full-time dedicated professional - which signifies huge cost savings on your part and maximum value for money. From specialist to non-technical, you get to hire your own â€œVirtual Employeeâ€ for any conceivable position. The recruitment process is thoroughly fool-proof. Once you have put across your job specification and the employee requirement, we forward you several resumes of prospective candidates. It is finally your call whom you want to hire after you have interviewed the candidates of your choice. We, being a tech-pro organization, make it sure, that your Virtual Employees are equipped with all the basic things that they need to work directly for and with you. The legal trivialities are all taken well care of by us.

Our platter is full when it comes to providing world-class outsourcing services. Some of the offerings include: â€¢ Specialist field (Typical cost $995) - Technical Support, Graphics Design, Financial Analyst, Journalists, SEM Internet Marketers, PPC Internet Marketers, Advertising, Marketing Consultants, SEO Internet Marketers, Accounting, Interior Designer. â€¢ Back office field (Typical cost $795) - Bookkeeping, Data Entry, Transcriptions, Medical Billing, Call Center Agents, Logo Designers, E-mail and Chat Support, Human Resources, System Analyst, Rebate Processing. â€¢ IT field (Typical cost $995) - Website Developer, Java, Hardware & Networking, Dreamweaver, C++, Mysql, Xhtml, Vb.net, Linux, Ajax, Php, Chip Design, ASP. â€¢ Scientific field (Typical cost $895) - Chemical Engineer, Bio Chemist, Operation Health Physicist, Electrical Engineer, Medical Assistant, Health & Safety Analyst, Molecular Biologist, Nutritionists, Engineering Designer, Bio Statistician, Microbiologist. â€¢ Other fields - E Learning, Corporate Planning, Cyber Assistants, E-Commerce, Animators, Game Designers.

We, at VirtualEmployee, aim at augmenting the competence of our client companies by providing invaluable assistance on their non-core competencies thereby enabling them to concentrate on strategic initiatives critical to their business. So, if you are thinking of outsourcing any kind of job at cost-effective rates, we are just a click away.
